localize.text: This place, where there was only silence, perhaps because it was only you and I here...
It has gotten a bit livelier thanks to the Sephirahs.
Unlike me they were weak and lacked rationality.
They made so many mistakes that greatly annoyed me.
I did not approve of you placing the Sephirahs here.
However, you told me that your atonement and the awakening of the Sephirahs were key to untying the knot.
I didn't know what you were talking about.
You also told me I wouldn’t understand.
You even blocked me from interfering with that relationship.
Saying that it must be left as solely your role.
You were right. Right as always.
Even if I stay here repeating this endlessly, it's probably not worth understanding till the end.
To quote one of your favorite lines, "Machines should act like machines."
So I had to play the role of the observer and had to endure all the pain that others forgot.
I don’t think I have to point that out again.
